org.mongodb.connection

Interface Cluster

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCluster

    public interface Cluster

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChangeListener(ChangeListener<ClusterDescription> changeListener)
      Adds a change listener to this cluster.
      void close() 
      ClusterDescription getDescription()

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        ClusterDescription getDescription()

      • addChangeListener

        void addChangeListener(ChangeListener<ClusterDescription> changeListener)
        Adds a change listener to this cluster.
        Parameters:
        changeListener - the listener for change events to the description of this cluster

      • removeChangeListener

        void removeChangeListener(ChangeListener<ClusterDescription> changeListener)
        Removes a change listener from this cluster. The first registered listener that compares equal to the given one will be removed.
        Parameters:
        changeListener - the change listener to remove.

      • getServer

        Server getServer(ServerSelector serverSelector)

      • close

        void close()

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
